lines.text: Some day the worm will turn.
Why should he? He's the same on both sides.
I want to cover Claremont County.

[Furious]
Get out of here befor you're carried out.
Gee, Mr. Byrd, you look mad enough to kill.
Listen, don't put ideas in my head, will you?
A life's a life even if it's only a dog's life.

[after seeing Doc trying to flim-flam a sucker]
I don't suppose you remember me, but my name's Flynn... Detective Flynn.
I'm afraid you're out of business in Chicago, Doc.
Well, you can't hang a man for trying.
No, but we can give him ten years.
